headline: BofA Lowers its Price Target on KKR & Co. Inc. (KKR) to $160 but Maintained a Buy Rating
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is among the 10 Best Consensus Buy-Rated Stocks to Invest in. On February 9, 2026, BofA lowered its price target on KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) to $160 from $164 previously but still maintained a Buy rating, revising EPS estimates following fourth-quarter results across its brokers, asset managers, and exchanges […]

headline: This week’s slump in asset-manager stocks was driven by private-credit fears. Here’s what’s worrying investors.
summary: Shares of asset managers fell due to worries over a private-credit fund managed by Blue Owl Capital, triggering broader anxiety about spillover effects.
